channel.title: Notes on Flowing fragments
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Flowing fragments

item.title: Jesmonite
item.description:
A few weeks ago, I was looking for an incense holder and found one I really liked. After ordering it, my husband took a look and asked if it was made of Jesmonite. He told me about a YouTuber he follows who creates amazing things with this material. That got me curious, and I immediately wanted to try it myself.

In the end, I invited my girlfriends to join me for a workshop. Hereâ€™s what we learned:

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article is a cheat-sheet for me to see how markdown is rendered with my custom Hugo theme called Oakley (after my dog).

item.title: Output
item.description: I’m struggling to find focus for myself at work. In the recent years, the ratio of my content consumption is 9 to 10. I am reading, watching, listening in order to find inspiration for my creative or personal projects. What I noticed that it never brings me any closer to creating any of those creative things.
